snippet: A long-simmering volcano’s powerful eruptions outside one of Guatemala’s most famous tourist attractions on Thursday prompted evacuation orders for more than 33,000 people.
lead_paragraph: A long-simmering volcano’s powerful eruptions outside one of Guatemala’s most famous tourist attractions on Thursday prompted evacuation orders for more than 33,000 people.

headline.main: Volcano Erupts Near Tourist Site in Guatemala
headline.print_headline: Volcano Erupts Near Tourist Site In Guatemala
